snippet.title: Hadr : Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hadr is a short atmospheric game where you control a piece of flying fabric.
Releasing on 6th of October on Steam and itch.io

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359760/Hadr/
itch.io: https://domkonecny.itch.io/hadr
Web: http://hadrgame.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hadr_game/
